AppPush.Title: Welcome to Collapse Launcher
AppPush.Message: Now you can install or migrate your existing game here. For more information/guides, please visit: https://github.com/neon-nyan/CollapseLauncher/Wiki

AppPush.Title: Announcement: Hi3Mirror Services are now Back to Online!
AppPush.Message:
We would like to inform you that Hi3Mirror services are now back to online! You can now back to use features like Caches Update, Cross-version Conversion and Game Repair in Collapse Launcher.

Thank you for your patience and support to this project.

Sincerely,
@neon-nyan

RegionPush.Title: Game Repair for Mainland China Region is Back to Online!
RegionPush.Message: Game Repair functionality for Mainland China region is now back to online! Thank you for your patience and now you can try this feature back again.
